text: 2015 local election results in Liverpool The 2015 Liverpool City Council election took take place on 7 May 2015 to elect members of Liverpool City Council in England. This was on the same day as other local elections. Due to the 'in thirds' system of election, one third of the council were up for election, with direct comparisons to previous results made with the corresponding vote at the 2011 Liverpool City Council election After the election, the composition of the council was: {| class="wikitable" |- !colspan="2"|Party!!Seats!! ± |- |style="background-color: " | |Labour || 81 || +3 |- |style="background-color: " | |Green || 4 || 0 |- |style="background-color: " | |Liberal Democrats || 2 || -1 |- |style="background-color: " | |Liberal || 2 || -1 |- |style="background-color: " | |Independent || 1 || -1 |- |} ==Election result in 2015== ==Ward results== * - Existing Councillor seeking re-election.
